title: Video: Rhye – The Fall (Live)
body: Having revealed all in an interview with [Pitchfork](http://pitchfork.com/features/rising/8976-rhye/), Mike Milosh and Robin Hannibal aka **Rhye** appear to be stepping out of the shadows, and have unveiled this stunning live version of _The Fall_ in order to help us come to terms with the fact that Milosh is male, and not female as many (myself included) had incorrectly assumed. Anyway, it’s as beautiful as their previous outings, complete with swirling strings and the simplistic yet hard-hitting piano section. Check it out below.
